EmailTemplate.textOnly: March 25, 2021 Podcast - Stories from the Field: Selling Mobile POS We’ve assembled members of our Hospitality Sales team from across the country on our latest Lokai podcast, Stories from the Field: Selling Mobil POS <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/Link/Content/DCakd7e_xK1EmUjIYZUKSTSw]]>. Listen at your convenience and learn from Carole Johnson, Matt Wulf, Matt Clay, Sam Ashkar, Jason Racimo and Dave Winterling as they talk about the value proposition of mobile solutions and provide specific points that will help you better position OrderPay with your customers.
